results.title: Atypical diabetes arising from SHORT syndrome: a case report.
results.text_hl: Although there are currently no established treatment guidelines for @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_SHORT_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C537327 @@@SHORT syndrome@@@, we implemented a comprehensive treatment plan, including lifestyle interventions, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_voglibose @CHEMICAL_MESH:C102817 @@@voglibose@@@ for @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ control.
